- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
      Full-stack consultant dashboard application with React frontend using Material UI 3, Node.js/Express backend, Google OAuth authentication, Google Calendar API integration, OpenAI GPT-4o mini integration, Tavily API integration, and MongoDB for caching.

- [x] Scaffold the Project
      Created full-stack application with React frontend (Material UI 3) and Node.js/Express backend. Backend includes Google OAuth, Google Calendar API, OpenAI, Tavily integrations, and MongoDB caching.

- [x] Customize the Project
      Implemented full consultant dashboard functionality with Google OAuth, Calendar integration, AI-powered meeting intelligence using OpenAI GPT-4o mini and Tavily API, MongoDB caching, and Material Design 3 UI with business-focused blue color scheme.

- [x] Install Required Extensions
      No specific extensions required for this project.

- [x] Compile the Project

- [x] Create and Run Task
      Created development task that starts both frontend and backend servers concurrently. Frontend runs on http://localhost:5173, backend on http://localhost:3001. Note: Backend requires API keys in .env file to run properly.
